data.text: I love every staffs here, they’re so kind and nice to us. I’m also in the Hospitality, smiling and sincere are the key for us, for guests. You did it! My favorite part is in the breakfast-time, I still can remember every staffs who worked in this time period. Here’s a Hello to you guys, here’s a big missed review and a truly thank you from your Chinese buddy for the good services you provided! Hope I can meet you all next time!
data.title: Totally brilliant location and services, one of the top choices in Antalya!

data.text:
The bathing platform was completely destroyed by a storm and is currently not available. Swimming not possible. We were very disappointed and were not informed of this before booking.
However, the view of the sea is spectacular and there is no better location if you want to be in the city. The staff was very friendly and accommodating.
data.title: City Hotel with great view

data.text:
Exceptional boutique hotel offering first class friendly service.
Tucked away near the historic area (very walkable to restaurants, marina, Hadrians gate etc) yet far enough away to be out of that areas “hustle and bustle”.
Beautiful views of the bay and background mountains.
Restaurant and bar are superb.
Bed was really comfortable and the room (Infinity King Suite) was large, beautifully decorated and very very quiet.
Room service fantastic…..in fact all of the staff went out of their way to make our 10 night stay an absolute pleasure.
data.title: Exceptional Boutique Hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Kev,

Thank you for your glowing review of our exceptional boutique hotel! We're delighted you enjoyed the first-class service and the convenient yet peaceful location near the historic area.

We're thrilled that you appreciated the beautiful bay and mountain views, superb restaurant and bar, and the comfort of our Infinity King Suite. Our team strives to make every stay special, and we're glad they succeeded during your 10-night visit.

We look forward to hosting you again for another fantastic experience. If you have any preferences for your next stay, feel free to share.

Best,
İlayda Nalbantlar
Perge Hotels
owner_response.author: Perge Hotels Management

data.text: If you’re looking for a small hotel (17 rooms) that feels like home, you found it. With a helpful and friendly attitude, the staff makes you feel welcome and appreciated. The rooms are spacious and comfortable. The terrace view couldn’t be better. Diving into the sea directly from the private shore with a „Pieds dans l‘eau“ experience feels as good as an evening stroll through the nearby old town and parks. Without any party hotels nearby, this is home away from home in a quiet athmosphere in central Antalya. If anything, they could change the music playlist once in a while, but that isn’t worth complaining… If it wasn’t adult only, we’d come more often, but next time the kid is staying with the grandparents, we might be on our way! Thank you so much for a perfect end of season stay!
data.title: The place to relax in Antalya

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for choosing our cozy hotel as your home away from home in Antalya. We're delighted to hear our staff's helpful and friendly attitude made you feel welcome. Your appreciation for the spacious rooms and breathtaking terrace view warms our hearts.

We're honored to provide a tranquil atmosphere in central Antalya, free from the hustle of party hotels. Your feedback on the music playlist is noted, and we'll consider refreshing it for a more varied experience.

We understand the desire for a family-friendly environment, and we'd be thrilled to welcome you back when the little one stays with the grandparents. Thanks for making our end-of-season stay memorable!

Best,
İlayda Nalbantlar
Perge Hotels
owner_response.author: Perge Hotels Management

data.text: Super cool hotel, stunning cliff hanging location with friendly genuine staff. Stayed 10-days and would have stayed longer had we been able to. Highly recommended. Pictures for once reflect the reality, which is rare.
data.title: Cool hotel, great location, pictures actually reflect the reality!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Robinson,

Thanks for the fantastic review! We're thrilled you enjoyed our cool hotel, great location, and the accurate representation of your experience in the pictures. Your 10-day stay and kind words about our friendly staff mean a lot. We'd have loved for you to stay longer! If you return, we'd be delighted to welcome you again.

Best,
İlayda Nalbantlar
Perge Hotels
owner_response.author: Perge Hotels Management
